name: Scarpa Furia Air Rock Shoes - Unisex
description: The closest thing to climbing barefoot, but better. Offering finger-like grabbing ability and designed for maximum toe sensitivity, the Furia Air is ready to grip whatever you’re sending. The perforated upper is light and breathable, and the Medial Lateral Tension system helps focus your foot power where you need it most.Double-layered microsuede upper is perforated on the outside.Alcantara fibres under big toe area help shoe mould to your foot.Dual-tension MLT (Medial Lateral Tension) randing focuses power under the big toe.Vibram® XS Grip 2 rubber-wrapped forefoot adds security on technical toe hooks and scums.Aggressive downturned design is ideal for steep routes and boulder problems.1mm Flexan midsole with a floating big toe pad adds slight support without losing sensitivity.Vibram® XS Grip 2 rubber provides exceptional friction and sensitivity.Members typically downsize 1-1.5 sizes (performance fit) or 0.5-1 sizes (comfort fit) from their street shoe size.
